name: Kids Station: Soreike! Anpanman
storyline:
Soreike Anpanman (written by Takashi Yanase, a Japanese writer of children's stories, is one of the most popular anime cartoon series in Japan. It is produced by Nippon Television Network Corporation. Each animated cartoon is approximately 24 minutes long split into 2 episodes of approximately 12 minutes each.

In each episode, Anpanman fights with Baikinman and helps the people of the town. He always goes on patrol in the area around the house of Jam Ojisan. He is a symbol of justice, fighting for the cause of justice every day. Anpanman has a long history and new characters are frequently introduced, keeping the series fresh.

The Playstation game is a collection of mini games in witch you control Anpanman in different kind of situations.
summary:
Soreike Anpanman (written by Takashi Yanase, a Japanese writer of children's stories, is one of the most popular anime cartoon series in Japan. It is produced by Nippon Television Network Corporation.
The Playstation game is a collection of mini games in witch you control Anpanman in different kind of situations.
